DOC.brief_summary: It phase IV , national , multicenter , observational , retrospective study collect data patient medical file French spinal center . The aim study describe real world use InductOs Spine fusion France . Approximately 10 French center enroll 400 patient . The retrospective review record focus patient undergone spinal fusion surgery . Patient consider enrollment he/she treat InductOs January 1 , 2011 31st December 2012 .
DOC.brief_title: InductOs® Real World Spine Surgery ; A Retrospective , French , Multi-centric , Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient spinal fusion surgery InductOs 1st January 2011 31st December 2012 2 . Patient medical record document Study Procedure least : Age , sex , medical history , primary diagnostic indication , level ( ) treat , procedure ( ) type , interbody device 's information use 3 . Patient receive `` information nonobjection letter '' reception confirm register courier 4 . Patient ≥18 year old date Study Procedure 1 . Patient decline participation 2 . Vulnerable patient , unable understand nonobjection letter unable exercise free decision refuse participate study ( investigator 's discretion ) 3 . Patient die since study procedure* 4 . Participation concurrent interventional trial study participation ( Study Procedure last study followup ) may confound study result
